meta_description: Producent win i destylatów w Łącka - produkujemy śliwowica z Łącka, gruszkówa, wina owocowe bio. Łącka śliwowica produkowana od pokoleń.
title: Śliwowica z Łącka, gruszkówka, wina owocowe, okowity - Manufaktura Maurera
content: Sweet wine that truly delights with its natural aroma and specific flavour of blackcurrant. It brings back the taste of home-made grandma’s wine. Blackcurrants are a valuable raw material for the production of wines due to the wide variety and amount of nutrients. On cold evenings it is perfect if served as mulled wine. Best served chilled in the temperature 12 - 18°C.
phrase: Wino z czarnej porzeczki (black currant wine)
